# 45. 游리 Add support for NEON and enable preswap and order fulfillment using the CrosschainForwarder.
Date of creation: 05.02.2023

#### Add support NEON network to deBridgeGate
Interact with: 0x43dE2d77BF8027e25dBD179B491e8d64f38398aA

```
 setChainSupport(uint256 _chainId, bool _isSupported, bool _isChainFrom) 
_chainId 100000001
_isSupported 1
_isChainFrom 1
```
```
 setChainSupport(uint256 _chainId, bool _isSupported, bool _isChainFrom) 
_chainId 100000001
_isSupported 1
_isChainFrom 0
```

####  Add support NEON network to DLN
```
DlnDestination: 0xE7351Fd770A37282b91D153Ee690B63579D6dd7f
setDlnSourceAddress(uint256 _chainIdFrom, bytes memory _dlnSourceAddress, ChainEngine _chainEngine)
chainId 100000001
_dlnSourceAddress 0xeF4fB24aD0916217251F553c0596F8Edc630EB66
EVM_TYPE
```

```
DlnSource: 0xeF4fB24aD0916217251F553c0596F8Edc630EB66
setDlnDestinationAddress(uint256 _chainIdTo, bytes memory _dlnDestinationAddress,  ChainEngine _chainEngine)
_chainIdTo 100000001
_dlnDestinationAddress 0xE7351Fd770A37282b91D153Ee690B63579D6dd7f
EVM_TYPE
```

####  Enable preswap and order fulfillment using the CrosschainForwarder.
CrosschainForwarder 0x663DC15D3C1aC63ff12E45Ab68FeA3F0a883C251
add supported routers:
- DlnDestination 0xE7351Fd770A37282b91D153Ee690B63579D6dd7f
```
updateSupportedRouter(address _srcSwapRouter, bool _isSupported)
_srcSwapRouter 0xE7351Fd770A37282b91D153Ee690B63579D6dd7f
_isSupported true
```
